Class dbtoken 

dbtoken

Classes extended from dbtoken:

Located in File: Program_Root/dbi/dbtoken.class.php

Databased token manager. 
Tokens are keys associated with a dbsession object and mixed data.
  • Package - Database
  • Access - public
